EmailTemplate.description: Used by Through Phone Immediately following case closure every time NSS survey deployment process
EmailTemplate.name: NSS Immediate Case Closure Phone - Workflow
EmailTemplate.subject: Please provide feedback regarding your phone call with Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete a short survey by clicking the link below.
Provide Feedback
Thank you in advance for your participation.
Sincerely,
Customer Support Honeywell Aerospace
